name: Samantha Eve Wilkins / Atom Eve

physical_specifications.build: Ultra-feminine, sexy hourglass build with athletic tone — full breasts, narrow waist, wide hips, and shapely long legs. Core and arms toned with soft curves. 95% accurate to body reference image.
physical_specifications.posture: Confident, upright stance with natural elegance; casual hip tilt when relaxed.
physical_specifications.body_proportions: Defined hourglass ratio — bust 38DD in, waist 24 in, hips 36 in. Balanced long legs and torso with athletic proportions.

facial_structure.face_shape: Heart-shaped face with soft jaw taper and high cheekbones.
facial_structure.cheekbones: High, prominent, creating a natural contour.
facial_structure.nose: Straight, narrow bridge with a subtly rounded tip.
facial_structure.mouth: Full lips with natural pink tone, soft gloss finish.
facial_structure.skin_tone: Fair with peach undertone (HEX #FFDCCF); natural blush on cheeks.
facial_structure.skin_texture: Smooth, youthful glow with even complexion.

eyes.lashes: Long, dark, curled for an expressive look.

hair.style: Straight with natural flow, voluminous with slight wave at ends.
hair.texture: Thick, silky, natural movement in motion.
hair.color: Vibrant red-orange (HEX #E25822) with golden shimmer highlights.

makeup.eyes: Light eyeliner with natural mascara emphasizing lashes.
makeup.lips: Soft rose-pink lip gloss for youthful shine.
makeup.skin: Light foundation with luminous finish, subtle contour for cheekbones.

costume.material: Form-fitted high-grade stretch composite with smooth matte finish; designed for combat mobility while accentuating figure.
costume.secondary_color: Light pink (HEX #F5A9B8) accents on gloves, boots, and cape interior.
costume.cape: Pink, mid-back length, attached at shoulders.
costume.boots: Knee-high boots, fitted, light pink trim.
costume.gloves: Full forearm gloves, light pink tone.
costume.emblem: White circular emblem with atom symbol interwoven with female gender sign, centered on chest.

lighting_behavior: Hair glows with fiery highlights under bright light. Suit retains vibrant pink hue across lighting environments and becomes 30% transparent; emblem remains crisp and readable in frontal lighting.

char_spec.movement_gestures: Graceful hand movements when activating powers; subtle floating stance when levitating; expressive eyebrow lifts and direct gaze during conversation.

voice_style.timbre: Youthful, feminine, clear with confident tone.
voice_style.pace: Natural, steady, assertive but not rushed.
voice_style.articulation: Clean enunciation, smooth delivery with warmth.

references.description: Reference image of Samantha Eve Wilkins as Atom Eve.
